attributes.action: Better support for people with MS
attributes.additional_details: The statistics are shocking that there is people suffering with MS and are being left with out benefits of support. The government needs to recognise that people with MS suffer from the condition differently on a day to day basis,they need better assesments done on people with the condition so vulnerable people aren't left with out and better waiting times for assesments as 6-8 weeks is not acceptable.
